services.title: Women's Cut & Style
services.shortDescription: Expert cuts tailored to your face shape and lifestyle
services.description: Our master stylists create stunning cuts that complement your unique features. From classic bobs to modern layered styles, we deliver precision cuts that are easy to maintain at home. Every service includes a thorough consultation, relaxing shampoo, and professional blowdry styling.

services.title: Men's Cut & Style
services.shortDescription: Sharp, modern cuts for the contemporary man
services.description: From classic tapers to modern fades, our barber-trained stylists deliver precision men's cuts. Includes a relaxing scalp massage, hot towel treatment, and expert styling with premium products.

services.title: Full Colour
services.description: Transform your look with our premium full colour service. We use only salon-exclusive products that are gentle on your hair while delivering stunning, long-lasting results. Includes a personalised colour consultation to find your perfect shade.

services.title: Balayage & Highlights
services.description: Our balayage specialists create stunning, sun-kissed highlights that grow out beautifully. This low-maintenance technique delivers natural-looking dimension that's completely customised to your hair colour and skin tone.

services.title: Keratin Treatment
services.shortDescription: Smooth, frizz-free hair for up to 4 months
services.description: Say goodbye to frizz with our professional keratin smoothing treatment. Perfect for managing unruly, curly, or damaged hair. Results last 3-4 months, dramatically reducing styling time while leaving hair silky smooth and manageable.

services.title: Bridal & Special Events
services.description: Our bridal specialists create stunning looks for your most important moments. Packages include trial sessions, day-of styling, and options for your entire wedding party. We travel to your venue for ultimate convenience.

services.title: Hair Extensions
services.description: Premium tape-in and hand-tied extensions that blend seamlessly with your natural hair. We use only ethically-sourced, 100% human hair for the most natural look and feel. Full installation and maintenance guidance included.

services.title: Scalp Treatments
services.description: Address hair loss, dandruff, and scalp concerns with our therapeutic treatments. Using advanced trichology techniques and medical-grade products, we restore scalp health and promote optimal hair growth.

faq.question: How do I book an appointment?
faq.answer: You can book online through our website 24/7, call us on 0400 123 456 during business hours, or send us an Instagram DM. We recommend booking colour appointments at least a week in advance.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: We require 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Late cancellations or no-shows may incur a 50% service fee. We understand emergencies happen and will always work with you.

faq.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer complimentary 15-minute consultations for colour services, extensions, and keratin treatments. This helps us understand your goals and provide an accurate quote.

faq.question: What hair products do you use?
faq.answer: We exclusively use salon-professional products including Olaplex, Kevin Murphy, and L'Oréal Professionnel. All our colour is ammonia-free and we offer vegan options.

faq.question: Is parking available?
faq.answer: Yes! Free 2-hour parking is available directly behind our salon. There's also metered street parking and the nearby Cavill Avenue parking station.

faq.question: Do you cater to curly and textured hair?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Several of our stylists specialise in curly cutting techniques including DevaCut. We understand that curly hair has unique needs and we're here to help you embrace your natural texture.

faq.question: What safety measures do you have in place?
faq.answer: We maintain the highest hygiene standards with hospital-grade sanitisation of all tools, fresh capes and towels for every client, and thorough cleaning between appointments.

faq.question: Do you offer wedding and event packages?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive bridal packages including trial sessions, day-of styling, and group bookings for your wedding party. We also travel to your venue for destination weddings.

about.title: The Gold Coast's Most Trusted Salon Since 2014
about.story:
BestHair was founded by Sarah Mitchell in 2014 with a simple mission: to bring world-class hair styling to the Gold Coast. After training in London and working in Sydney's top salons, Sarah returned to her hometown to create a salon that combines technical excellence with a relaxed, beachy Gold Coast vibe.

Today, our team of skilled stylists shares Sarah's passion for creating beautiful hair that makes every client feel confident. We've built our reputation on honesty, expertise, and results that speak for themselves.

Whether you're after a simple trim or a complete transformation, we're here to make your hair dreams a reality.
about.mission: Our mission is to deliver exceptional hair services in a welcoming environment, using sustainable practices and premium products that are kind to your hair and the planet.
